attributes.description:
2015 Hyundai IX35 2.0 CRDi Elite AWD for sale. Don't miss this low mileage diesel SUV. Car is very well kept in excellent condition!
Standard Features: ABS | EBS | Stability Control | Power Steering | Central Locking |  Aircon | Climate Control | CD player/AUX input/USB port/Bluetooth | Panoramic Sunroof | Towbar | Leather Interior 

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Hyundai IX35 2.0 CRDi Elite 4x2
Power - 130 kW @ 4000 rpm
Torque - 383 Nm @ 1800 rpm
Economy - 6.5 l/100km
Emissions - 170 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU5
Gears - 6 / ALL
Acceleration - 9.4 seconds
Top Speed - 195 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,410 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 58 litres
Boot Capacity - 591 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
